cn.trackCensoredName: 逐鹿 - 历史沙盘战棋
cn.trackName: 逐鹿 - 历史沙盘战棋
cn.releaseNotes:
1、全新虚构剧本「斜谷残阳」正式上线
3、重制：郭淮（曹魏）、马忠（蜀汉）
大幅优化：严纲
3、修复自创地图可能出现资源异常的问题；
4、修复删除自创武将后可能出现的问题；
5、修复武将阵亡或未在本势力中时可能出现的问题；
6、修复在查看神童天赋时可能出现的问题；
7、修复查看事件列览时可能出现的问题；
cn.description:
经典三国单机版

《逐鹿》是一款基于同名历史沙盘游戏引擎开发而成的三国题材回合制策略游戏。在硝烟四起、诸侯争霸的三国乱世中，玩家可以在剧本中任意选择势力，饰演主公。通过内政、外交等玩法助你运筹帷幄。带领麾下群雄，攻城略地，在辽阔的战场上开疆扩土。或兴复汉室，或成一代枭雄，皆掌握在你的手中。

问鼎九州，逐鹿三国

《逐鹿》的历史剧本以《三国演义》为蓝本推演而来，游戏贯穿历史典故，力求还原三国时期的史实风貌。玩家可以任意挑选剧本，并饰演其中一势力的主公，谋定三国，一统九州。

山河为子，天下为局

《逐鹿》以经典六角战棋玩法为核心战斗模式，玩家可以指挥部队以“六角战棋”的形式纵横驰骋于大战场之上，或与敌人短兵相接，或以计谋决胜千里之外，在矢石之间，开疆扩土。

坚甲利兵，攻无不克

在游戏中兵种可分为步兵、骑兵、机械三大类，细分则有弓兵、弩兵、盾兵、轻骑兵等十余种。还有数十种专属兵种可以携带，出征时根据战况调配兵种阵容，能够达到先发制人，克敌机先的效果。

鸾翔凤集，龙幡虎纛

根据历史文献记载以及结合三国演义内容，目前游戏中已设计武将有600余名。每个武将具有独特的特性，可以凸显武将的差异化。不仅如此，我们还为历史名将绘制了精致的专属立绘，彰显其个性。

专门为关注自恋型人格障碍（Narcissistic Personality Disorder, NPD）的用户提供全面的认知、评估、应对和支持服务。应用基于权威心理学研究和临床实践经验，旨在帮助用户更好地理解NPD，学习有效的应对策略，并获得必要的专业支持。
Medical Disclaimer: The information in this app is provided for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.
免责声明：本应用提供的内容仅供教育和参考之用，不能替代专业医生的诊断或治疗建议。如有任何健康问题，请务必在使用本应用的内容前咨询医生或其他有资质的医疗服务人员。

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===
===中国地区正式回归===

这是游戏创作者继获奖作品Kingdom Rush（王国保卫战）三部曲之后的又一超凡太空奇幻历险之作。即时，动态以及深度策略的游戏模式将带你穿越到不可思议的未知星球。沉浸式拟真游戏场景，过瘾的游戏玩法，以及超凡绝佳的艺术感和一丝诙谐幽默感带你进入激烈的战争世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的机甲人和强大的外星人通通等你来统率，并肩迎接最强挑战。

招募和训练银河系中最伟大的英雄，率领他们参与几乎不可能完成的危险任务，发动他们强大的力量和能力。即使是在战斗最激烈的时候你也可通过改变自己部队的角色而进行战略调整，突击队员调整为狙击兵，火焰喷射器调整为导弹发射器。通过炸弹袭击，智能地雷，支援部队，砲塔和各种特种武器转变战斗态势。

机器人军队整装待发;星际战舰坠毁了;到处是巨大怪物，未知的种族;所向披靡的攻击;绝望的营救;无所畏惧地破坏行动正在银河之中发生......银河系需要你的统领。

银河系需要钢铁战队

***游戏特色***

-指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。准备好发动英勇的攻击，坚守阵地，拯救平民，潜入超级计算机和各种英雄的物品。每个任务需要新的战术和行动才能取得胜利。

-通过17次终结式特别行动的战术规则测试你的机智。每个关卡通过伤痕铭记挑战。谅你也不敢。

-解锁不可能模式。仅对大无畏敢死队开放。谅你绝对不敢。

-在史诗战斗中击败巨大而非凡的头目。这些头目卑鄙而异常地巨大，他们决心要将你碾碎。钢铁战队，整装待发！

-40+升级以提升你的战略，同时授予你的部队防御无人机，凝固汽油弹火箭，反弹爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

-14位具有出色能力的英雄听从你的调遣。将他们训练到极致出色，否则惹恼他们后果自负。

-8种可向敌人发动进攻的特种武器，让你的战术更加具有深度。还有什么比得上一个瞄准了的导弹？对50枚高爆炸炸弹的轨道炮袭击！

-完成70+成就中的任何成就，赢得你应得的奖励。

选择你的游戏困难模式，找到属于你的公平挑战：休闲，普通或老兵，你自己决定！！

cn.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
cn.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

hk.description:
經典三國單機版

《逐鹿》是一款基於同名歷史沙盤遊戲引擎開發而成的三國題材回合制策略遊戲。在硝煙四起、諸侯爭霸的三國亂世中，玩家可以在劇本中任意選擇勢力，飾演主公。通過內政、外交等玩法助你運籌帷幄。帶領麾下群雄，攻城略地，在遼闊的戰場上開疆擴土。或興復漢室，或成一代梟雄，皆掌握在你的手中。

問鼎九州，逐鹿三國

《逐鹿》的歷史劇本以《三國演義》為藍本推演而來，遊戲貫穿歷史典故，力求還原三國時期的史實風貌。玩家可以任意挑選劇本，並飾演其中一勢力的主公，謀定三國，一統九州。

山河為子，天下為局

《逐鹿》以經典六角戰棋玩法為核心戰鬥模式，玩家可以指揮部隊以「六角戰棋」的形式縱橫馳騁於大戰場之上，或與敵人短兵相接，或以計謀決勝千里之外，在矢石之間，開疆擴土。

堅甲利兵，攻無不克

在遊戲中兵種可分為步兵、騎兵、機械三大類，細分則有弓兵、弩兵、盾兵、輕騎兵等十餘種。還有數十種專屬兵種可以攜帶，出征時根據戰況調配兵種陣容，能夠達到先發制人，克敵機先的效果。

鸞翔鳳集，龍幡虎纛

根據歷史文獻記載以及結合三國演義內容，目前遊戲中已設計武將有600余名。每個武將具有獨特的特性，可以凸顯武將的差異化。不僅如此，我們還為歷史名將繪制了精緻的專屬立繪，彰顯其個性。
hk.releaseNotes:
1、全新虛構劇本「斜谷殘陽」正式上線

大幅優化：嚴綱

5、修復武將陣亡或未在本勢力中時可能出現的問題；
6、修復在查看神童天賦時可能出現的問題；
7、修復查看事件列覽時可能出現的問題；

hk.description:
傳奇遊戲製作人小島秀夫帶來顛覆傳統的遊戲體驗，在這無可比擬的《死亡擱淺導演剪輯版》中加以擴展。 
 
在未來，一場名為「死亡擱淺」的神秘事件，開啟了生死兩界間的大門，彼世的生物在殘破不堪、關係疏離的末日世界四處遊蕩。 
 
玩家扮演山姆·布橋斯，一肩扛起責任，在面目全非的美國聯繫僅餘的倖存者，為人類社會帶來希望。 
你能一步步重新聯繫這個分崩離析的世界嗎？ 
 
《死亡擱淺導演剪輯版》Mac 版充分運用如 MetalFX Upscaling 等 Metal 3 功能，帶來無與倫比的精細畫質與驚人的效能。此外還包含高幀率的拍照模式，以及與 Valve Corporation 的《HALF-LIFE》系列和 CD Projekt Red 的 《電馭叛客 2077》的聯動內容。使用 Social Strand System™ 與全球玩家保持連繫。

Mac 與 iOS
• 如欲遊玩此產品，需登入 iCloud 並啟動 iCloudDrive。
• 此產品可離線遊玩，但若想完整體驗 Social Strand System™ 的功能，則必須使用網路連線。線上遊玩時會產生電信費用。

iOS 版專屬說明
• 首次遊玩此產品時，您需下載額外資料。下載約 13 GB 的遊戲內容後即可開始遊玩，但隨著遊戲進行將持續下載額外遊戲內容，總共需下載約 50 GB 的資料。如欲使用多種語言的語音資料，需下載額外內容。

FAQs
https://505.games/DSDCAppStoreFAQ

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.releaseNotes:
- 調整了怪獸平衡，並準備新的怪獸與技能。
- 修復了各種錯誤。
hk.description:
收服和養成超過2000隻以上的精美動畫後製完怪獸，成為傳說中的訓練師！並和世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！

收服、訓練和養成超過2000隻怪獸，打造專屬於你的隊伍通往勝利之路！超大型的怪物對戰RPG手遊！

夢幻怪獸是一款讓人欲罷不能的RPG手遊，主打四對四特殊回合制戰鬥，最多16隻怪獸組成一個隊伍。獨創對戰系統和上百種技能讓每一次戰鬥更加熱血和多元。終極進化你的怪獸，釋放它們的真正力量，主宰PvP賽場！您準備好進入夢幻怪獸的世界了嗎？

▶遊戲特點:
●  收集怪獸
• 捕捉和養成1000隻以上的精美動畫後製怪獸！
• 完成終極進化，釋放真正潛能。
• 收集特殊素材，解放秘密技能！

●  打造隊伍
• 用16隻怪獸，研發終極隊伍。
• 特殊回合制戰鬥，擊敗你的宿敵！
• 超過100種怪獸技能，打出致命Combo！

●  成為傳奇
• 征服六個聯盟、挑戰至上四強。超過60個小時的冒險故事！
• 探索六座島嶼和無數地下城！
• 隨著劇情，揭發隱藏在百年帝國維羅希亞華麗外表下的黑歷史。

●  Online對戰
• 和來自世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！
• 超過100支線上任務。
• 參加每週特殊活動，贏得更多豐富獎勵！

• 本遊戲內容涉及「性」、「暴力」，故建議應列級別為「輔導15歲級」。
• 本遊戲內有提供購買虛擬貨幣、物品等付費服務。
• 注意使用時間，避免沉迷於遊戲。

mo.description:
傳奇遊戲製作人小島秀夫帶來顛覆傳統的遊戲體驗，在這無可比擬的《死亡擱淺導演剪輯版》中加以擴展。 
 
在未來，一場名為「死亡擱淺」的神秘事件，開啟了生死兩界間的大門，彼世的生物在殘破不堪、關係疏離的末日世界四處遊蕩。 
 
玩家扮演山姆·布橋斯，一肩扛起責任，在面目全非的美國聯繫僅餘的倖存者，為人類社會帶來希望。 
你能一步步重新聯繫這個分崩離析的世界嗎？ 
 
《死亡擱淺導演剪輯版》Mac 版充分運用如 MetalFX Upscaling 等 Metal 3 功能，帶來無與倫比的精細畫質與驚人的效能。此外還包含高幀率的拍照模式，以及與 Valve Corporation 的《HALF-LIFE》系列和 CD Projekt Red 的 《電馭叛客 2077》的聯動內容。使用 Social Strand System™ 與全球玩家保持連繫。

Mac 與 iOS
• 如欲遊玩此產品，需登入 iCloud 並啟動 iCloudDrive。
• 此產品可離線遊玩，但若想完整體驗 Social Strand System™ 的功能，則必須使用網路連線。線上遊玩時會產生電信費用。

iOS 版專屬說明
• 首次遊玩此產品時，您需下載額外資料。下載約 13 GB 的遊戲內容後即可開始遊玩，但隨著遊戲進行將持續下載額外遊戲內容，總共需下載約 50 GB 的資料。如欲使用多種語言的語音資料，需下載額外內容。

FAQs
https://505.games/DSDCAppStoreFAQ

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
mo.releaseNotes:
- 調整了怪獸平衡，並準備新的怪獸與技能。
- 修復了各種錯誤。
mo.description:
收服和養成超過2000隻以上的精美動畫後製完怪獸，成為傳說中的訓練師！並和世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！

收服、訓練和養成超過2000隻怪獸，打造專屬於你的隊伍通往勝利之路！超大型的怪物對戰RPG手遊！

夢幻怪獸是一款讓人欲罷不能的RPG手遊，主打四對四特殊回合制戰鬥，最多16隻怪獸組成一個隊伍。獨創對戰系統和上百種技能讓每一次戰鬥更加熱血和多元。終極進化你的怪獸，釋放它們的真正力量，主宰PvP賽場！您準備好進入夢幻怪獸的世界了嗎？

▶遊戲特點:
●  收集怪獸
• 捕捉和養成1000隻以上的精美動畫後製怪獸！
• 完成終極進化，釋放真正潛能。
• 收集特殊素材，解放秘密技能！

●  打造隊伍
• 用16隻怪獸，研發終極隊伍。
• 特殊回合制戰鬥，擊敗你的宿敵！
• 超過100種怪獸技能，打出致命Combo！

●  成為傳奇
• 征服六個聯盟、挑戰至上四強。超過60個小時的冒險故事！
• 探索六座島嶼和無數地下城！
• 隨著劇情，揭發隱藏在百年帝國維羅希亞華麗外表下的黑歷史。

●  Online對戰
• 和來自世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！
• 超過100支線上任務。
• 參加每週特殊活動，贏得更多豐富獎勵！

• 本遊戲內容涉及「性」、「暴力」，故建議應列級別為「輔導15歲級」。
• 本遊戲內有提供購買虛擬貨幣、物品等付費服務。
• 注意使用時間，避免沉迷於遊戲。

tw.releaseNotes:
1、全新虛構劇本「斜谷殘陽」正式上線
3、重制：郭淮（曹魏）、馬忠（蜀漢）
大幅優化：嚴綱
3、修復自創地圖可能出現資源異常的問題；
4、修復刪除自創武將後可能出現的問題；
5、修復武將陣亡或未在本勢力中時可能出現的問題；
6、修復在查看神童天賦時可能出現的問題；
7、修復查看事件列覽時可能出現的問題；
tw.description:
經典三國單機版

《逐鹿》是一款基於同名歷史沙盤遊戲引擎開發而成的三國題材回合制策略遊戲。在硝煙四起、諸侯爭霸的三國亂世中，玩家可以在劇本中任意選擇勢力，飾演主公。通過內政、外交等玩法助你運籌帷幄。帶領麾下群雄，攻城略地，在遼闊的戰場上開疆擴土。或興復漢室，或成一代梟雄，皆掌握在你的手中。

問鼎九州，逐鹿三國

《逐鹿》的歷史劇本以《三國演義》為藍本推演而來，遊戲貫穿歷史典故，力求還原三國時期的史實風貌。玩家可以任意挑選劇本，並飾演其中一勢力的主公，謀定三國，一統九州。

山河為子，天下為局

《逐鹿》以經典六角戰棋玩法為核心戰鬥模式，玩家可以指揮部隊以「六角戰棋」的形式縱橫馳騁於大戰場之上，或與敵人短兵相接，或以計謀決勝千里之外，在矢石之間，開疆擴土。

堅甲利兵，攻無不克

在遊戲中兵種可分為步兵、騎兵、機械三大類，細分則有弓兵、弩兵、盾兵、輕騎兵等十餘種。還有數十種專屬兵種可以攜帶，出征時根據戰況調配兵種陣容，能夠達到先發制人，克敵機先的效果。

鸞翔鳳集，龍幡虎纛

根據歷史文獻記載以及結合三國演義內容，目前遊戲中已設計武將有600余名。每個武將具有獨特的特性，可以凸顯武將的差異化。不僅如此，我們還為歷史名將繪制了精緻的專屬立繪，彰顯其個性。

专门为关注自恋型人格障碍（Narcissistic Personality Disorder, NPD）的用户提供全面的认知、评估、应对和支持服务。应用基于权威心理学研究和临床实践经验，旨在帮助用户更好地理解NPD，学习有效的应对策略，并获得必要的专业支持。

Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.

us.description:
From legendary game creator Hideo Kojima comes a genre-defying experience, now expanded in this definitive DIRECTOR’S CUT. 
 
In the future, a mysterious event known as the Death Stranding has opened a doorway between the living and the dead, leading to grotesque creatures from the afterlife roaming the fallen world marred by a desolate society. 
 
As Sam Bridges, your mission is to deliver hope to humanity by connecting the last survivors of a decimated America. 
 Can you reunite the shattered world, one step at a time?

DEATH STRANDING DIRECTOR'S CUT on iOS includes a HIGH FRAME RATE, PHOTO MODE, and cross-over content from Valve Corporation's HALF-LIFE series and CD Projekt Red's Cyberpunk 2077. Stay connected with players around the globe with the Social Strand System™.

Mac and iOS
• Sign-in to iCloud and activation of iCloudDrive are required to play this product.
• This product can be played offline, but a network connection is required to fully experience the Social Strand System™. Communication fees will be incurred during online play.

Only for iOS version
• When playing this product for the first time, you will be required to download additional data. You can start the game once you have downloaded approximately 13 GB, but additional downloads will occur as the game progresses, requiring a total of approximately 50 GB of downloads. Additional downloads will occur when additional language voice data is used.

FAQs
https://505.games/DSDCAppStoreFAQ

Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.

us.releaseNotes:
- Monster balance adjustments, along with the introduction of new monsters and skills.
- Various bug fixes and improvements.
us.description:
Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP!

Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs!

Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge?

▶Features:
●  Build your Monster Collection
• Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters!
• Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential.
• Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power!

●  Form a Battle Strategy
• Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters.
• Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles!
• Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities.

●  Become the Champion
• Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure!
• Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey.
• Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncle’s atrocity.

●  Take the Battle Online
• Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues!
• Complete 100+ online missions.
• Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards.

Follow us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/NeoMonstersOfficial/
Join the Neo Monsters community:
http://www.neomonstersforum.com/
Issues or questions? Contact our support:
neomonsupport.gameplay@zigzagame.net

Terms of Service:
https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/
Privacy Policy:
https://www.zigzagame.com/privacy-policy/

advisories: Loot Boxes
us.sellerName: Out of the Park Developments GmbH & Co KG
us.releaseNotes:
26.6.73.15 
- Improvements to player development 
- Misc Go specific QoL changes 
- Misc bug and crash fixes
- Updated data
us.description:
Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! 

Manage teams, control any franchise in 2025 or throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, build a completely fictional baseball universe and so much more. You can oversee your league at a high level or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered.

Play Your Way
· Franchise Mode: A single-player oriented mode where you can run your favorite MLB, KBO, international or fictional baseball organization. 2025 MLB and 2025 KBO seasons - with accurate teams, schedules, and rosters - are included! Plus! 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons also included. 
· Perfect Team Mode: Build a dynasty in this online mode competing against players around the world.

Manage MLB History
· Gain access to historical MLB leagues and rosters from 1901 - 2024
· Simulate any and all MLB scenarios and games that you have dreamt of
· Manage all on-field decisions and strategies
· Draft, scout, trade, and sign players to build a powerhouse 

Official MLB & KBO Licenses
· Full 2025 rosters from both MLB & KBO franchises free with game purchase
· Includes full MLB and MiLB rosters

Create Your Perfect Team
· Create your own custom team to pit against players around the world
· Cross-platform compatibility with Out of the Park Baseball 26 users
· Pull and collect player cards from the vast player pool available
· Compete in tournaments against other players to see who has the best team

New This Year
· Full Scouting System: Improve scouting accuracy on players, develop reports, choose priorities, assign scouting budgets, and more
· 3D Upgrades: New dynamic scoreboard, custom randomized fictional park generation
· Roster, AI, and Engine: Greatly improved AI, added more variety and detail in players ratings by expanding the internal scale
· KBO Improvements: Added military service time and free agent cash compensation
· Perfect Team Notifications: New settings all you to choose what to receive push notifications about
· Perfect Team Clubhouse Stars: Purchase exclusive cards and pack bundles with these Stars; earned through tournaments, Perfect Draft, and league play.
· Perfect Team Variants: New and revamped boosted-card mechanic, with a more user friendly way to boost; "feed as you go"
· And more!


OOTP Go 26 comes with an additional three historical MLB seasons for FREE! Run any franchise from the 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons. All other historical MLB seasons (1901-2024) available for purchase.

us.description:
Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! 

Manage teams, control any franchise in 2025 or throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, build a completely fictional baseball universe and so much more. You can oversee your league at a high level or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered.

Play Your Way
· Franchise Mode: A single-player oriented mode where you can run your favorite MLB, KBO, international or fictional baseball organization. 2025 MLB and 2025 KBO seasons - with accurate teams, schedules, and rosters - are included! Plus! 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons also included. 
· Perfect Team Mode: Build a dynasty in this online mode competing against players around the world.

Manage MLB History
· Gain access to historical MLB leagues and rosters from 1901 - 2024
· Simulate any and all MLB scenarios and games that you have dreamt of
· Manage all on-field decisions and strategies
· Draft, scout, trade, and sign players to build a powerhouse

tr.releaseNotes:
Hello everyone, this version has improved a series of issues. However, [Auto Record] is currently undergoing internal refactoring work and is not yet complete. We will introduce AI for small-scale testing in the near future, striving to make Auto Record more intelligent. If needed, you can follow our WeChat official account [Qianji], and we will release updates at any time.

New Features:
• New batch delete feature
• Search icons when adding categories
• Account book management - Support searching account books
• Settings page - Add toggle for showing category month-over-month comparison in statistics
• Search page - Add precise search option, exact match for transaction amount/notes
• Adjust transaction image compression strategy to maintain clarity when uploading long images

Bug Fixes:
• Calculation error in currency conversion
• Remaining daily average budget calculation error
• Savings plan amount display abnormal
• Installment accounting plan calculation error
• Debt remaining amount display error
• Credit card billing cycle calculation error
• Transactions with refunds showing incorrect actual amount
• Tag group statistics page - Add pie chart for tag-based statistics
• Auto Record asset list sorting inconsistent with in-app
• Expense report page search doesn't close third-party keyboard after selecting list item
• Revert changes, allow generating expense reports with 0 amount during reimbursement
• Asset group management - Hidden assets no longer appear when selecting accounts
• When deleting categories, home page transaction list doesn't refresh after migrating transactions

Improvements:
• Transaction list popup can scroll and adjust height with page content
• Auto Record fails to record successfully in some situations
• Auto Record jump to accounting interface supports transaction images
• Auto Record - Asset matching accuracy improved
• Submit transaction page - Multiple zeros after decimal point are deleted at once
tr.description:
MoneyTrack - Streamlined Personal Finance Tracker

Track every penny, master your financial freedom. A pure expense tracking app with no ads, no splash screens, and no investment promotions.

■ CORE FEATURES
• Auto-Tracking: Deep integration with Shortcuts allows automatic expense recording triggered by your transactions
• Comprehensive Entries: Support for income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management
• Insightful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns with pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly identify financial issues
• Precise Budgeting: Set annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily budget adjustments

■ COMPLETE ASSET MANAGEMENT
• Unified management of multiple account types (cash, bank cards, credit cards, store cards)
• Balance sheet and asset curve for real-time financial status tracking
• Credit card management system (payment reminders, limit management, interest-free period calculation)
• Multi-currency asset recording with support for all major currency exchange rates

■ THOUGHTFUL FUNCTIONS
• Multiple Ledgers: Flexibly separate different financial records
• Shared Accounting: Invite family and friends to maintain transparent shared finances
• Cloud Backup: Free data synchronization across devices with secure protection
• Flexible Import/Export: Support for importing data from multiple platforms and exporting in Excel format
• Recurring Entries: Customisable automatic entry tasks that generate transactions on schedule
• Installment Tracking: Easily monitor payment schedules and receive timely reminders
• Sub-Categories: Unlimited categorisation options to meet personalised needs

■ CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE
Synchronise across iPhone, iPad and PC with real-time updates, recording every expenditure wherever you are.

■ FOCUSED ON FINANCE MANAGEMENT
We do one thing only — help you better manage your personal finances. No investment promotions, no community distractions, just a pure and efficient expense tracking experience.

专门为关注自恋型人格障碍（Narcissistic Personality Disorder, NPD）的用户提供全面的认知、评估、应对和支持服务。应用基于权威心理学研究和临床实践经验，旨在帮助用户更好地理解NPD，学习有效的应对策略，并获得必要的专业支持。
Medical Disclaimer: The information in this app is provided for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.
免责声明：本应用提供的内容仅供教育和参考之用，不能替代专业医生的诊断或治疗建议。如有任何健康问题，请务必在使用本应用的内容前咨询医生或其他有资质的医疗服务人员。

tr.description:
Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP!

Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs!

Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge?

▶Features:
●  Build your Monster Collection
• Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters!
• Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential.
• Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power!

●  Form a Battle Strategy
• Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters.
• Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles!
• Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities.

●  Become the Champion
• Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure!
• Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey.
• Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncle’s atrocity.

●  Take the Battle Online
• Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues!
• Complete 100+ online missions.
• Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards.

Follow us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/NeoMonstersOfficial/
Join the Neo Monsters community:
http://www.neomonstersforum.com/
Issues or questions? Contact our support:
neomonsupport.gameplay@zigzagame.net

Terms of Service:
https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/
Privacy Policy:
https://www.zigzagame.com/privacy-policy/

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Cartoon or Fantasy Violence
tr.description:
After a devastating earthquake strikes Istanbul, can you find the woman you love?

In a fully hand-drawn Istanbul, embark on a journey that tests your instincts and hopes. After the earthquake, you must cross the city — from Bakırköy to Üsküdar — to find the woman you love.

Explore a hand-drawn, post-quake Istanbul — from shattered historic neighborhoods to the edge of the Bosphorus. Every corner hides new stories and challenges. In the heart of chaos, survival is not enough. You must do it without losing your honor.

On your journey to save your girlfriend, you’ll face not only physical obstacles but also emotional and psychological trials. The people you meet among the ruins—and their stories—will push you to make difficult moral choices.

To move forward, you’ll need to solve puzzles, crack safe codes, pick locks, explore devastated locations, and manage your energy wisely.

Quakeline is more than just a game; it is a project that aims to raise awareness about the possible impact of a real earthquake in Istanbul. Through its fictional yet grounded narrative, the game invites players to reflect on survival, resilience, and the human spirit.

Witness the struggle to survive—and the power of hope.
In this unforgettable journey, you’ll not only navigate through debris but also discover the deepest and purest parts of what it means to be human.

tr.releaseNotes: macOS 26 Updates to the user interface and settings
tr.description:
Apple’s App of the Year with over 15 million downloads and 200,000 5-star ratings globally, Day One has reinvented journaling letting you record your life as you live it. Securely save audio, video, photos, notes, and more in the world’s most trusted digital journal. 

“Day One creates something so rare it feels almost sacred: A completely private digital space.” – New York Times

“Day One makes keeping a journal delightfully easy.” – Wired

“This superb journaling app remains pleasant to behold, easy to use, and a tough act for any rival to follow.” – Macworld

WHY DAY ONE?

Day One is the original journal app and a decade of updates and feature additions make it the most private, trusted, and easiest-to-use journaling platform in the world. 

SIMPLE TO USE, EASY TO LOVE

• Beautiful, award-winning design
• Unlimited text entries 
• Unlimited photos and videos*
• Powerful rich text formatting with markdown
• Different journals for every aspect of your life*

PRIVATE AND SECURE 

• Automatic backups keep your journal entries safe
• End-to-end encryption, which is a fancy way of saying your entries are 100% private
• Journal entries stay secure with passcode or TouchID
• Export options (pdf, plain text, JSON, etc.) ensure your entries always stay yours

FORM A HABIT & STAY CONSISTENT 

• Programmable reminder notifications
• Unique, daily journal prompts help eliminate writer’s cramp 
• Customizable templates save time and add organization to entries
• Today view provides a summary of where you’ve been and what you’ve done

JOURNAL FROM WHEREVER, WHENEVER

• Cross-platform apps available on iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad, and Mac 
• The ability to email entries straight to your journal

BUILT FOR REMINISCING

• On This Day feature allows you to revisit past memories
• Tags, favorites, and search filters make it easy to find what you’re looking for
• Map view quickly shows all the places you’ve journaled from

*Day One is FREE to use forever with unlimited entries. Additional features, including unlimited photos, videos, and sync are available with a Day One Premium membership. Start a free trial today. 

Privacy Policy: https://dayoneapp.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Use: https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/

For technical assistance or other inquiries: https://dayoneapp.com/contact/
